attr.title: Spacewing War
attr.desc: Blast through adorable enemies in this side scrolling shmup that's sure to remind you of a gameboy classic game, only, this game has over 40 color pallets to choose from.
attr.inst: Purchase from Steam, Pneuma Games https://store.steampowered.com/app/1979470/Spacewing_War  Locate data.win plus audiogroup1 & audiogroup2 files and place them inside the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase from Steam, [Pneuma Games](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1979470/Spacewing_War)  Locate data.win plus audiogroup1 & audiogroup2 files and place them inside the gamedata folder.
